members.member:
The logical order of bits within a byte.
1 = MSB-to-LSB 2 = LSB-to-MSB (flipped)
Uncompressed mode flag: 1 if uncompressed, 0 if not.
EOL padding flag: 1 if fill bits have been added before an EOL such that the EOL ends on a byte boundary, 0 otherwise.
Invokes the superclass method and then sets instance variables on the basis of the metadata set on this decompressor.

member.summary: Describes view modes for .

member.name: F:C1.WPF.PdfViewer.ViewMode.Normal
member.summary: Display pages using the current zoom value.

member.name: F:C1.WPF.PdfViewer.ViewMode.OnePage
member.summary: Automatically update the zoom value to fit one complete page inside the viewport.

member.name: F:C1.WPF.PdfViewer.ViewMode.FitWidth
member.summary: Automatically update the zoom value to fit the width of one page inside the viewport.

members.member: Automatically update the zoom value to fit two complete pages, side by side, inside the viewport.
